eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2 (00:13): UNICODE IS THE ANSWER

1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:13): Unicode has a non-gendered artificial entity gender symbol?
eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2 (00:14): If it doesn't, we should submit a request for one to be put in
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:14): We'll write the request together.

a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:14): Separately, so you don't know what the other one has written.

1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:19): Hrm.  There *is* an appropriate gender symbol for an AI.

a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:21): That's a MEDIUM WHITE CIRCLE
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:21): Also, apparently, a gender symbol.
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:21): I see no such restriction.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:22): It's like using 'he' as a gender neutral pronoun.
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (00:22): Singular they, dammit!
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:22): No such thing.  Those gender symbols are all perfectly fine for other lifeforms.
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:23): Artificial lifeforms count.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:23): Now you're being lifeist
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:23): Unless you're saying that you can't use the male symbol for, say, a male rabbit?
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:24): What if the AI doesn't consider itself a life form?
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (00:24): Yup, I'm lifeist.  I'd like to see non-life say anything to me about it.
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (00:24): You will be first up against the wall when skynet comes
